name: Live-admin-customizer
tagline: Create Customized theme for wordpress admin panel
body:
# Live Admin Customizer.
Create Customized theme for wordpress admin panel simply selecting colors in theme creation panel
And also manage created theme..

***

## Plugin Feature List
1. Built-in 5 Admin Themes
2. Create New Themes
3. Delete Created Existing Themes

***
## Wordpress Installation
```
1. Download Latest Source From [Github Download](https://github.com/technofreaky/Live-Admin-Customizer/archive/master.zip) [Wordpress Download](https://wordpress.org/plugins/live-admin-customzier)
2. Activate the plugin through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress
3. Create New Theme Using [Live Admin Customizer]
```
***

### Github Fork
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
***

###  Contributors & Supports
karthik Sekark (@karthiksekark) pulled me to create a raw webpage customizer  using [php,scss & html]. and i have created and we discussed and started create as plugin for wordpress admin.
***
This plugin used SCSS Compiler in php Developed By leafo (@leafo) [https://github.com/leafo/scssphp](https://github.com/leafo/scssphp) .. i would like to thank the developer...
 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Live Admin Customizer ? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or Submit an issue at https://github.com/technofreaky/Live-Admin-Customizer/issues or contact varunsridharan23@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
